title: Gori Papa Ikka no Nougyou wa Omoshiroi
original_name: ゴリパパ一家の農業はオモシロイ
sinopse: The 4-koma manga Gori Papa Ikka serialized in Nihon Nougyou Shinbun (The Japan Agricultural News) reached its 10,000th serialization on May 1, 2017. A short web animation was made in honor of it as well as in honor of the magazine's 90th anniversary.
